name: Deep Secrets
description:
the ocean is rising. the ground is sinking. and you're looking for somewhere to keep you safe. luckily, the ocean will never turn away anyone with saltwater in their veins.

she'll share her secrets.

will you still stay with her afterwards?

(a vague, abstract game that may or may not serve as lore for an unwritten novel, and mostly serves as me going, yes, i totally can make a game)
